# Code of Conduct

## Our Commitment
We strive to make this project welcoming, inclusive, and respectful to everyone.

## Expected Behavior
- Be respectful and constructive in discussions
- Accept feedback graciously
- Use inclusive language and remain professional

## Unacceptable Behavior
- Harassment, discrimination, or personal attacks
- Derogatory or abusive language
- Sharing private information without consent

## Reporting
If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, email:

ashmitkumar1020@gmail.com

Reports will be reviewed and handled fairly and confidentially.

## Scope
This policy applies to issues, pull requests, discussions, and public project spaces.

Thanks for helping us keep the community healthy and welcoming.
